nobel thyagaya sadaha miyagiya aya nam karanna awasara nathath nama yojana ha kamitu thirana prakasha kirima athara miyagiya aya innawa. 1931 di sahithya nobel thyagaya dinu erik aksal kalfeld, 1961 di sama thyagaya himiwu dag hamarshald yana dedenama thyagaya labimata pera miya giya. 1974 di thiranaya wuna, nobel thyagaya piri namanne adala wasare okthobaraye di nam prasiddha karana thek jiwath wu ayata pamanayi, kiya. 1996 di aarthika widyawata nobel thyagaya himi karagath wiliyam wikri sammanaya prakashayata karanawita jiwathun athara sitiyath thyagaya pirinamana awasthawa wana wita miyagos sitiyath ohuta sammanaya pirinamanu labuwa.
